topic.title: New to Zero
topic.body: Tips for Noobs (like me). Please add links or advice to new users. Thanks ;)

topic.title: Programming tips
topic.body: Hi all. Can anyone link me in to some good visual basic programming sites - in particular re: excel?

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Hi. ZeroNet appears to be very good :)
